00015 int PrintHelp(const char* dummy = ""){
00016   MessageHandler::GetInstance()->End();
00017   std::cout<<"Usage: ascii_dump [options] <file1> [<file2, ... ] \n";
00018   ConfigHandler::GetInstance()->PrintSwitches();
00019   exit(0);
00020 }
00021 
00022 void SetOutputFile(AsciiWriter* writer, const char* inputfile){
00023   if( writer->GetFilename() == writer->GetDefaultFilename() ){
00024      //set the filename to be the input filename + .txt
00025     std::string fname(inputfile);
00026     //remove leading directories
00027     while(fname.find('/') != std::string::npos){
00028       fname = fname.substr(fname.find('/')+1);
00029     }
00030     //remove filename suffix
00031     fname = fname.substr(0, fname.find('.'));
00032     //append the root filename
00033     fname.append(".txt");
00034     writer->SetFilename(fname);
00035   }
00036 }
00037 
00038 int ProcessOneFile(const char* filename, int max_event=-1, int min_event=0)
00039 {
00040   Message(INFO)<<"\n***************************************\n"
00041                <<"  Processing File "<<filename
00042                <<"\n***************************************\n";
00043   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00044   Reader reader(filename);
00045   
00046   if(modules->Initialize()){
00047     Message(ERROR)<<"Unable to initialize all modules.\n";
00048     return 1;
00049   }
00050   
00051   //read through the file and process all events
00052   time_t start_time = time(0);
00053   int evtnum = min_event;
00054   while(reader.IsOk() && !reader.eof()){
00055     if(max_event > 0 && evtnum >= max_event) 
00056       break;
00057     Message(DEBUG)<<"*************Event "<<evtnum<<"**************\n";
00058     if(evtnum%5000 == 0)
00059       Message(INFO)<<"Processing event "<<evtnum<<std::endl;
00060     
00061     RawEventPtr raw = reader.GetEventWithIndex(evtnum++);
00062     if(!raw){
00063       Message(ERROR)<<"Problem encountered reading event "<<evtnum<<std::endl;
00064     }
00065     modules->Process(raw);
00066     
00067   }
00068   //finish up
00069   modules->Finalize();
00070   Message(INFO)<<"Processed "<<evtnum - min_event<<" events in "
00071                <<time(0) - start_time<<" seconds. \n";
00072   return 0;
00073 }
00074 
00075 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00076 {
00077   int max_event=-1, min_event = 0;
00078   ConfigHandler* config = ConfigHandler::GetInstance();
00079   config->AddCommandSwitch('h',"help","display this help page",PrintHelp);
00080   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"max","last event to process",
00081                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(max_event),
00082                            "event");
00083   config->AddCommandSwitch(' ',"min","first event to process",
00084                            CommandSwitch::DefaultRead<int>(min_event),
00085                            "event");
00086   
00087   EventHandler* modules = EventHandler::GetInstance();
00088   //modules->AddCommonModules();
00089   AsciiWriter* writer = modules->AddModule<AsciiWriter>();
00090 
00091   try{
00092     config->ProcessCommandLine(argc,argv);
00093   }
00094   catch(std::exception& e){
00095     Message(EXCEPTION)<<"While processing command line: "<<e.what()<<std::endl;
00096     PrintHelp();
00097   }
00098 
00099   if(argc < 2){
00100     Message(ERROR)<<"Incorrect number of arguments: "<<argc<<std::endl;
00101     PrintHelp();
00102   }
00103   
00104   for(int i = 1; i<argc; i++){
00105     if(i > 1)
00106       writer->SetFilename(writer->GetDefaultFilename());
00107     SetOutputFile(writer, argv[i] );
00108     if(ProcessOneFile(argv[i], max_event, min_event)){
00109       Message(ERROR)<<"Error processing file "<<argv[i]<<"; aborting.\n";
00110       return 1;
00111     }
00112   }
00113   return 0;
00114 }
